doc.title: Plugins
doc.desc: The Plugins class is a class that manages plugins. Objects cannot be created from this class.

member.name: link
member.desc: Links (loads) the specified plugin to the KiriKiri core.

member.name: unlink
member.result: True if unlinking succeeded, false if it failed
member.desc: Unlinks the specified plugin. Some plugins may not respond to release requests (e.g., when objects are in use). If the plugin does not release and fails, false is returned.

member.name: getList
member.result: An array containing the names of linked plugins
member.desc: Gets the list of plugins. The returned array lists the plugin names in the order they were linked.
